content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisableSiteWAF path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/waf content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable waf
responses
title: 26_Site Features_DisableSiteWAF_155.json
